page.title: 13HOMELIFE IN NORTH BRENT
page.content: We usually wake up at about 7/00a.m. and have breakfast which includes cereals, egg, bacon or toast with coffee, tea or fruit juice to drink.If we have pets, we feed them next. Then we tidy our bedrooms and prepare a lunch for school. We either go by car or walk to {school} and play until 8.50 a.m. when we enter our classrooms and our teacher takes the register. Then we have assembly when our headteacher tells us about famous people or traditions. We have {two} lessons before lunch which include Maths, English, Science or History. After lunch we read and have another lesson before our last playtime.After this we have our last lesson and at 3.45p.m. we go home. We have music lessons, go to clubs or watch television until 9.p.m. Most of us live with our mothers and fathers.
